data.name: BELOW - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Jim Guthrie, Canadian Indie rock stalwart and composer of beloved soundtracks Superbrothers: Sword & Sworcery EP, Indie Game The Movie, and Reigns: Her Majesty takes listeners even deeper with BELOW.

BELOW'S expansive original soundtrack blends Guthrie's distinct acoustic melodies with moody atmospherics, sparkling synth soundscapes, haunting drones and driving rhythms--bringing alive the mystery of BELOW in an epic journey for listeners.
data.about_the_game:
Jim Guthrie, Canadian Indie rock stalwart and composer of beloved soundtracks Superbrothers: Sword & Sworcery EP, Indie Game The Movie, and Reigns: Her Majesty takes listeners even deeper with BELOW.

BELOW'S expansive original soundtrack blends Guthrie's distinct acoustic melodies with moody atmospherics, sparkling synth soundscapes, haunting drones and driving rhythms--bringing alive the mystery of BELOW in an epic journey for listeners.
data.short_description: Delve deep into The Depth's with Jim Guthrie's stunning soundtrack for BELOW
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (with Platform Update for Windows 7)
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 550 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 750 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

data.legal_notice: BELOW Soundtrack is Copyright 2018 Jim Guthrie
